flawed_nl_solution:
It takes Lara 7 minutes and 23 seconds to make it through the obstacle course the first time. 7 minutes x 60 seconds per minute = 420 seconds + 23 seconds = <<7*60+23=447>>447 seconds to get through the first part of the obstacle course.
The second stage of the obstacle course she completes in 73 seconds + 447 seconds = <<73+447=520>>520 seconds.
It takes 5 minutes and 58 seconds for Lara to get through the obstacle course the second time. 5 minutes x 60 seconds per minute = 300 + 58 seconds = <<300+58=358>>358 seconds.
Combined, it takes Lara 520 + 358 seconds = <<520+358=878>>878 seconds for Lara to run the whole obstacle course.
#### 878

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 443, not 447. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
